reasoning: The test failed because the automated tester couldn't complete the prerequisite step of submitting a comment, not because of an actual bug. No errors, crashes, or broken UI elements are visible - the Activity Stream shows normal like/unlike functionality working on posts.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows a normally functioning Activity Stream with posts, working Like/Unlike buttons on posts, and Comment links present. The tester was unable to complete comment submission (likely a test automation limitation with form interaction), preventing verification of the comment-specific like feature. No error states or UI issues are visible.
